about-text: Greetings! My name is Guilherme Branco De Campos, I am an IT professional with experience in BI and web development. I have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and a technical degree in Informatics. This responsive portfolio was developed with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, using GitHub as a repository and deployed via Vercel. I am driven by curiosity, proactivity, and a constant quest for knowledge, always seeking to understand and optimize processes.
title: Front-End Developer
expSum1: Developer responsible for the layout of pages using VueJS, ReactJS, TailwindCSS, and Axios.
expSum2: Development of a solution for SERPRO related to government procurement using VueJS and CSS.
expSum3: Planning and development of a web application for conducting the FENADEPOL election using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
expSum4: B.I consultancy in the Directorate of Development and Health and development of dashboards using Python and Power BI.
hoverTouchP: Hover/Touch over to know the proficiency level
projSum1: Responsive Web app based on Hulu that uses The Movie DB API to request movie data.
projSum3: Responsive web app that uses the Jikan API to request anime data and add them to your list.
projSum4: Responsive web app that uses the Google API to search for results.
